Html:
Not sure why but when I go to run the installer for the Redaction Tool it tells me that it's installing Microsoft Virtual PC 2007.  Any idea what's up with that?

Running Office 2010 64-bit on Windows 7 64-bit.

None - I'm guessing it means your Windows Installer state is corrupted somehow (all of the setup work is standard Windows Installer). If you let it complete, does it actually do anything? You might try doing that, then running it again?
